config.script:
import time
	
	logger = system.util.getLogger('GatewayEvent_Update')
	
	defaultPath = "/usr/local/bin/ignition/data/projects/default.json"
	mesPath = "/usr/local/bin/ignition/data/projects/mes.json"
	appPath = "/usr/local/bin/ignition/data/projects/app_1.json"
	tagPath = "/usr/local/bin/ignition/data/projects/tag_1.json"
	gatewayHealthPath = "/usr/local/bin/ignition/data/projects/app.json"
	
	system.tag.exportTags(filePath=defaultPath, tagPaths=["[default]"])
	system.tag.exportTags(filePath=mesPath, tagPaths=["[MES]"])
	system.tag.exportTags(filePath=appPath, tagPaths=["[Tag1_System]"])
	system.tag.exportTags(filePath=tagPath, tagPaths=["[App1_System]"])
	system.tag.exportTags(filePath=gatewayHealthPath, tagPaths=["[GatewayHealth]"])
	
	
	time.sleep(5)
	
	logger.warn('starting push')
	system.perspective.print('start')
	res = system.util.execute(["/usr/local/bin/ignition/data/git-auto-commit.sh"])
	logger.warn(res)
	logger.warn('end push')
	system.perspective.print('end')
